Umineko Project (UP): "Well, it feels a bit weird saying this, ...but I was sure this story would be in the standard mystery genre. I'm a little surprised to find out that it's fantasy. Turkish (TR): "......Heh! Gerçekten bana ayak parmaklarını öptürmeyi bu kadar çok mu istiyorsun...?! Ancak teslim olursam! Ama izle... bu numarayı kesinlikle ortaya çıkaracağım ve sonra sana kıçımı öptüreceğim!"

Russian (RU): "...............Хи‐хи. Какой прелестный мужчина. Я запомню это обещание. ...Слабые ведьмы целуют зад демонов, чтобы получить силу. Потому что не существует более унизительной клятвы полного повиновения. Одни эти слова в мой адрес распаляют моё желание унизить тебя. .........Хи‐хи‐хи."

Indonesian (IDN): "...*cackle* What a delightful man. I'll remember that promise. ...Weak witches kiss the behinds of demons to gain power. Because there's no more humiliating oath. Just being told that makes me want to force you into surrender. ...*cackle*cackle*...!"

Soltanto sentirmelo dire mi fa venire voglia di piegarti a me... Mhmhmhmh...!"
Turkish (TR): "...............*cackle*. Ne çekici bir adam. Bu sözü unutmayacağım. ...Zayıf cadılar güç kazanmak için iblislerin arkalarını öperler. Çünkü tam bir teslimiyet için daha büyük bir yemin yoktur. Bu gibi sözler bana sana boyun eğdirme arzusu veriyor. .........*cackle*cackle*...!"

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "Come, arise, children. I am the guide of Purgatory. Wield the seven stakes, which forgave the deadly sins."
Steam (ST): "Come, arise, children. I am the guide of Purgatory. Forgive the deadly sins and hold the Seven Stakes."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Come, arise, children. I am the guide of Purgatory. Forgive the deadly sins and hold the seven stakes."
PC Japanese (JP): 「さぁさ、お出でなさいな子どもたち。我こそは煉獄の案内人。大罪を赦せし七つの杭を持て。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さぁさ、お出でなさいな子どもたち。我こそは煉獄の案内人。大罪を赦せし七つの杭を持て」
Russian (RU): "Ответьте на мой зов, восстаньте, дети. Я — проводник через чистилище. Взываю к семи кинжалам, что отпускают смертные грехи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Vamos, levantem‐se, crianças. Eu sou a guia do Purgatório. Empunhe as sete estacas, que perdoam os sete pecados capitais."
Vietnamese (VI): "Come, arise, children. I am the guide of Purgatory. Wield the seven stakes, which forgave the deadly sins."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「來來，孩子們都出來吧。吾乃煉獄之指路人。身懷七樁以赦大罪。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「来来，孩子们都出来吧。吾乃炼狱之指路人。身怀七桩以赦大罪。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Come, arise, children. I am the guide of Purgatory. Forgive the deadly sins and hold the Seven Stakes."
Italian (IT): "Orsù, uscite fuori, bambine mie. Io sarò la vostra guida lungo il purgatorio. Perdonate i sette peccati capitali, e brandite i sette picchetti."
Turkish (TR): "Gelin, uyanın, çocuklar. Ben Araf'ın yol göstericisiyim. Ölümcül günahları bağışlayan yedi kazığı kullanın."

Umineko Project (UP): Guided by those magic words, which sounded like a psalm, seven stakes gathered.{n}...They were the stakes of the seven demons symbolizing the deadly sins of sinful people.
Steam (ST): Guided by those magic words, which sounded like a command, seven stakes gathered. ...They were the stakes of the seven demons symbolizing the deadly sins of sinful people.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Guided by those magic words, which sounded like a command, seven stakes gathered....They were the stakes of the seven demons symbolizing the deadly sins of sinful people.
PC Japanese (JP): 謳うような魔法の言葉に導かれ、７つの杭が集います。…それは、罪深き人の大罪を象徴する七人の悪魔たちの杭。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 謳うような魔法の言葉に導かれ、７つの杭が集います。{n}…それは、罪深き人の大罪を象徴する七人の悪魔たちの杭。
Russian (RU): Повинуясь этим волшебным словам, прозвучавшим как псалом, возникло семеро кинжалов.{n}...То были кинжалы семи демонов, символизирующих смертные грехи людей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Guiadas por aquelas palavras mágicas, que soavam como um salmo, sete estacas apareceram.{n}...Elas eram as estacas dos sete demônios simbolizando os pecados capitais de uma pessoa pecadora.
Vietnamese (VI): Guided by those magic words, which sounded like a psalm, seven stakes gathered.{n}...They were the stakes of the seven demons symbolizing the deadly sins of sinful people.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被吟唱一般的魔法語言所引導，七根樁刺匯聚而來。{n}…這樁屬於七位惡魔，象徵著罪孽深重之人的七重大罪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被吟唱一般的魔法语言所引导，七根桩刺汇聚而来。{n}…这桩属于七位恶魔，象征着罪孽深重之人的七重大罪。
Indonesian (IDN): Guided by those magic words, which sounded like a command, seven stakes gathered. ...They were the stakes of the seven demons symbolizing the deadly sins of sinful people.
Italian (IT): Si radunarono sette picchetti, guidati da quelle parole magiche celebratorie...Erano i picchetti con sopra sette demoni, rappresentanti i sette peccati capitali di coloro che hanno perso la retta via.
Turkish (TR): Bir ilahiyi andıran bu büyülü sözlerin rehberliğinde yedi kazık bir araya geldi.{n}...Bunlar günahkâr insanların ölümcül günahlarını simgeleyen yedi iblisin kazıklarıydı.

Umineko Project (UP): The two demonic stakes burst into motion like billiard balls struck by a cue, and were sucked in through the crack of the door.
Steam (ST): The two stakes of the demons were sucked in through the crack of the door, like billiard balls struck by a cue stick.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The two stakes of the demons were sucked in through the crack of the door, like billiard balls struck by a cue stick.
PC Japanese (JP): その２本の悪魔の杭は、まるでキューに弾かれたビリヤードの玉のように弾かれ、扉の隙間に吸い込まれていきます。

Umineko Project (UP): Then came the sound of them deflecting repeatedly off the walls of the room, making a sound like a woodpecker.
Steam (ST): Then, several scattered noises refracted through the wall, making a sound like a woodpecker.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, several scattered noises refracted through the wall, making a sound like a woodpecker.
